Deadly Venom.name: Deadly Venom
Deadly Venom.blurb: Twitch's basic attacks infect the target, dealing true damage each second.
Deadly Venom.description: Innate: Twitch's basic attacks  poison his target with Deadly Venom, each attack adding one stack on-hit.
Deadly Venom.description2: Each Deadly Venom stack deals 1 / 2 / 3 / 4 / 5 (based on level)  true damage per second over 6 seconds, stacking up to 6 times for a maximum 6 / 12 / 18 / 24 / 30 (based on level)  true damage per second.
Deadly Venom.description3: Each application of Deadly Venom resets the duration.
Deadly Venom.notes:
* The enhanced attacks will apply other on-hit effects and can  critically strike as normal (the bonus damage cannot).
 Deadly Venom does not affect structures.
 Deadly Venom cannot be  parried or  blocked but can be  dodged and/or negated if Twitch is  blinded.
 Deadly Venom interacts with  Twin Fang (thus granting  Cassiopeia its bonus effects) and cannot be mitigated by  Black Shield.

Ambush.name: Ambush
Ambush.blurb: Twitch becomes Camouflaged for a short duration and gains Movement Speed. When leaving Camouflage, Twitch gains Attack Speed for a short duration. When an enemy champion with Deadly Venom dies, Ambush's cooldown is reset.
Ambush.description: Active: After a 1 second delay, Twitch becomes  camouflaged for a duration. Entering stealth cancels Twitch's current basic attack. Basic attacks and abilities break the stealth on-cast.
Ambush.description2: While stealthed he gains  10% bonus movement speed, increased to 30% when he moves toward enemy champions within a 1000-range radius who cannot see him.
Ambush.description3: Upon breaking stealth he gains  bonus attack speed for 5 seconds.
Ambush.description4: Ambush's  cooldown is reset if an enemy champion dies while affected by  Deadly Venom.
Ambush.notes:
* Ambush has no cast time and does not interrupt Twitch's previous orders.
 Twitch will not break stealth if he uses consumable items (wards, potions).
 Twitch will break stealth if he uses  Recall or  Teleport while Ambush is active or if he uses active ability items ( Blade of the Ruined King). Twitch can perform actions as normal during the 1 second delay. Pressing recall before disappearing will allow Twitch to recall while camouflaged.

Venom Cask.name: Venom Cask
Venom Cask.blurb: Twitch hurls a cask of venom that explodes in an area, slowing targets and applying deadly venom to the target.
Venom Cask.description: Active: Twitch hurls a cask of venom at the target area, infecting all enemies hit with a  Deadly Venom stack.
Venom Cask.description2: The target area becomes contaminated for 3 seconds, applying a  Deadly Venom stack each second and  slowing all enemies inside it.
Venom Cask.notes: * Venom Cask can apply a maximum of 4  Deadly Venom stacks per enemy.

Contaminate.name: Contaminate
Contaminate.blurb: Twitch wreaks further havoc on poisoned enemies with a blast of his vile diseases.
Contaminate.description: Active: Twitch deals  physical damage to all nearby enemies afflicted by  Deadly Venom, with each stack granting bonus damage.
Contaminate.leveling: Base Physical Damage:20 / 30 / 40 / 50 / 60Bonus Damage Per Stack:15 / 20 / 25 / 30 / 35 (+ 35% bonus AD) (+ 20% AP)Minimum Damage:35 / 50 / 65 / 80 / 95 (+ 35% bonus AD) (+ 20% AP)Maximum Damage:110 / 150 / 190 / 230 / 270 (+ 210% bonus AD) (+ 120% AP)
Contaminate.description2: Contaminate cannot be activated if there are no nearby enemies afflicted by  Deadly Venom.
Contaminate.notes:
*  Deadly Venom stacks remain on enemy targets after Twitch uses Contaminate.
 Twitch is given a range indicator for Contaminate's radius upon infecting an enemy champion with  Deadly Venom (actual range is slightly larger than shown in-game).
 Contaminate will not damage enemy targets whose  Deadly Venom stacks wear off or if they move out of Contaminate's range before Twitch can cast.

Spray and Pray.name: Spray and Pray
Spray and Pray.blurb: Twitch unleashes the full power of his crossbow, shooting bolts over a great distance that pierce all enemies caught in their path.
Spray and Pray.description: Active: Twitch gains bonus attack damage and his basic attacks gain  300 bonus range for 5 seconds.
Spray and Pray.description2: Additionally, Twitch's basic attacks travel across their full range and skewer every enemy they pass through for the duration, dealing 100% − 40% (based on enemy hit) damage. These attacks apply on-hit effects to all affected enemies and can  critically strike against each individual target.
Spray and Pray.notes:
* Spray and Pray has no cast time and does not interrupt Twitch's previous orders.
 Spray and Pray enables Twitch to outrange turrets by 50 units, allowing him to hit them without them returning fire.
 Twitch's enhanced attacks will pass through terrain and enemy structures (the latter will be damaged even if they are not directly targeted while Spray and Pray is active).
  Runaan's Hurricane's Wind's Fury interacts with Spray and Pray's bonus attack range but not with the enhanced attacks (the secondary bolts will not pass through enemy units, enemy structures, or terrain).
